Hello. I am not sure if this is the correct place for this (sort of SEO related), so please let me know if I should send this elsewhere.

I'm having an issue with the Largest Contentful Paint element on PageSpeed Insights. I have tried resizing the image, changing formats, preloading, asynchronously decoding, eagerly loading, different <source> on the module I was having the issue with.

In the end, after nothing working, I removed the module (hero) entirely. The issue simply "moved" to the next module: 14 seconds LCP. Any ideas or suggestions on what might be happening?
did you find a solution to this? 6 months later and the docs still don't seem to provide the answers
There is also an <#CF540P856|seo> channel if you want to try there later!

Anyone else here have Form Modules stop working on Content Hub websites yesterday that are HubDB Driven.  We had multiple client websites break yesterday and all their HubDB driven form pages were not displaying the forms.

All of our sites that used the documented method stopped working, here is the code below:

```{% module "form"
path="@HubSpot/form"
form={
"form_id": "9e633e9f-0634-498e-917c-f01e355e83c6",
"response_type": "redirect",
"message": "Thanks for submitting the form.",
"redirect_id": null,
"redirect_url": "<http://www.google.com>"
}
%}```
We had to switch to the Form Method

```{% form
form_to_use='9e633e9f-0634-498e-917c-f01e355e83c6',title="Form Title",
response_redirect_url='<http://www.google.com>',
response_response_type='redirect',
%}```
Here is the HubSpot Documentation: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/cms/modules/default-modules#form>

Curious what others are seeing or if you have aninsightâ€¦thanks
